Name: Trigger Dungeon
About the game: Navigate the many trap-filled rooms, avoiding obstacles, fiendish devices and pitfalls. Trigger Dungeon is a troll and rage precision platformer with a wide variety of tricks and challenges. Ideal for speedrunners and anyone who needs to raise their blood pressure. Play alone or with an audience. Nearly 200 rooms across 3 worlds Easy to understand gameplay Colourful, chunky pixel art graphics Steam achievements Spikes, spikes everywhere! Don't trust anything Play keepie-uppie or die Conquer the wall of death! Get fired out of a cannon
